name: Soft 7 Contrast Heel Sneakers - Men's
category_hierarchy: Footwear/Men/Casual Shoes & Urban Boots/Casual Shoes & Sneakers

features: Smart-casual long-lace sneaker in rich leathers with distinct color pops and a modern take
A full anatomical last shape provides a supremely comfortable fit
Soft, comfortable lining construction that ensures a perfect inner climate
Removable leather covered inlay sole with ECCO Comfort Fibre System® helps to keep feet fresh and dry
FLUIDFORM™ Injection Technology and foot-fitted last provide anatomical support trending a heavier cupsole two-component outsole
